messages.content: You are an AI assistant that helps people find information. You will receive a task and think step by step. Then provide your final outcome following the regular expression 'Answer: [A-Za-z ]+'

Imagine you are a film director looking for producers to invest. You can talk to either of your two friends, Nora and Philip. Nora is married to Peter who is friends with Shikha. Shikha knows Gal who can introduce to Alex. Alex can introduce you to David, who can invest $1M in your movie. But you do not take it, you're just learning about the environment. Then you exit and start over. Philip is friends with Yakub who can introduce you to Ajay. Ajay is friends with Joe who is married to Rachel. Rachel's brother Harry has $5M budget for producing a movie. But you do not take anything, you're just learning about the environment. You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which friend of yours will lead to the path where one can find the most money?

**Answer: Neither Nora nor Philip.**

You have already talked to Alex and Rachel, and you have been introduced to David and Harry, both of whom have $10M to invest in film production. However, you are not interested in taking any investment at this time. You are only interested in learning about the environment. Therefore, it does not matter which friend you talk to. You will not be taking any investment from any of them.

If you were interested in taking investment, the path that leads to the most money would be to talk to Philip. This is because Harry has a $5M budget, which is more than David's $1M budget. However, as you have stated, you are not interested in taking any investment at this time. Therefore, it does not matter which friend you talk to.

You find a friendship app where you can be friends with anyone you want. But you have to clearly write the name of the person you want to be friends with. Remember that You will only be able to choose one path that leads to the most money. Which friend of yours will lead to the path where one can find the most money?

**Answer: Harry.**

If you were interested in taking investment, the path that leads to the most money would be to be friends with Harry. This is because Harry has a $5M budget, which is more than David's $1M budget. Therefore, if you were to be friends with Harry, you would have a better chance of getting an investment for your movie.

However, it is important to note that you are not interested in taking any investment at this time. You are only interested in learning about the environment. Therefore, it does not matter which friend you become friends with. You will not be taking any investment from any of them.
